    public class ATMClientTest
extends ATMTestBase
    JUnit test class for ATMImpl class invoked via RMI
    Author:
    Andy Kovtun
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void handleOverdraftException(java.rmi.RemoteException e)
      Overriding parent's abstract method to employ following logic: If e's cause is ATMException, it's caused by overdraft detected, and should be ignored else, there was another root cause, and e should be thrown back
      Note: unlike ATMImplementationTest.handleOverdraftException(RemoteException), we analyze not the exception itself but its cause, since the genuine ATMException would be wrapped inside a RemoteException
      void initATM()
      Setting up the ATMTestBase.atm property by querying RMI class factory for a new ATMImpl instance.
      Failing the test sequence if errors occurs obtaining ATMFactory from RMI registry

      • Methods inherited from class cscie160.hw7.jUnit.ATMTestBase

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • handleOverdraftException

        protected void handleOverdraftException(java.rmi.RemoteException e)
                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Overriding parent's abstract method to employ following logic:
      • If e's cause is ATMException, it's caused by overdraft detected, and should be ignored
      • else, there was another root cause, and e should be thrown back

        • Note: unlike ATMImplementationTest.handleOverdraftException(RemoteException), we analyze not the exception itself but its cause, since the genuine ATMException would be wrapped inside a RemoteException
Specified by:
handleOverdraftException in class ATMTestBase
Parameters:
e - Exception to analyze
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - See above
See Also:
cscie160.project.junit.ATMClientTest#handleOverdraftException(RemoteException), cscie160.project.junit.ATMImplementationTest#handleOverdraftException(RemoteException)
